localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Sell access to a google sheet without sharing with the whole INTERNET. Easy to set up via Gumroad. Using gumroad ping, this sheet's script captures all sales and matches the sale with a sheet you assign in. Then gives viewer access to the buyer.
blogPost.body: Sell access to a google sheet without sharing with the whole INTERNET. Easy to set up via Gumroad. Using gumroad ping, this sheet's script captures all sales and matches the sale with a sheet you assign in. Then gives viewer access to the buyer.
blogPost.title: OnlySheets - Sell access to any Google Sheet
blogPost.author: Andrew Kamphey
